name: GetBroadcastActionLinkMetrics
description:
Retrieve link click metrics for a specific broadcast action.

This tool retrieves link click metrics for an individual broadcast action. It provides data for a maximum of 45 days, unless specified otherwise. Use appropriate period and step parameters for custom data ranges.

parameters.name: broadcast_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the broadcast to retrieve metrics for. It should be an integer value.

parameters.name: broadcast_action_id
parameters.description: The ID of the action you want to look up or act on.

value_schema.description: The action you want to lookup or act on.

parameters.name: time_period_unit
parameters.description: The unit of time for the report. Acceptable values are 'hours', 'days', 'weeks', or 'months'.

value_schema.description: The unit of time for your report.

parameters.name: number_of_periods_to_return
parameters.description: The number of time periods to return metrics for. Defaults to the maximum, or 12 if in months. Max: 24 hours, 45 days, 12 weeks, 121 months.

value_schema.description: The number of periods you want to return. Defaults to the maximum available, or `12` if the period is in `months`. Maximums are 24 hours, 45 days, 12 weeks, or 121 months. Days start at 00:00 EST. Weeks start at 00:00 EST on Sunday. Months start at 00:00 EST on the 1st of the month.

parameters.name: item_type
parameters.description: Specifies the type of item to return metrics for; options include email, webhook, twilio, slack, push, and in_app. Leave empty for all types.

value_schema.description: The type of item you want to return metrics for. When empty, the response contains metrics for all possible types.
